name: Galaxy of Disagreements: Grow the Federation
name_original: Galaxy of Disagreements: Grow the Federation
description:
You are a commander of the Galactic Federation, and your job is to make the Federation grow by conquering new areas occupied by rebels and pirates.

Upgrade your ship and defeat harder opponents!

THE DOWNLOADABLE VERSION OF THE GAME USES AUTOSAVE, so you can exit and continue later from where you left!
